segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy's teetering on that stool for cookies.

segments.text: Grabbing sweets like it's no big deal, with the whole thing wobbling.

segments.text: No one's watching the water damage or the risky climb.

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to think of the slip or fall that might come.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a serene garden, mocking the indoor turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the family; this could ruin their day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these obvious problems?
segments.speaker: PAR
